alert.note: Alert for Shoshone, Lava Beds; Wood River Foothills (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 22 at 1:57PM MDT by NWS Pocatello
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Blaine and north central Lincoln Counties through 245 PM MDT... At 155 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles south of Gannett, or 8 miles southwest of Picabo, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of southwestern Blaine and north central Lincoln Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Shoshone, Lava Beds; Wood River Foothills
